General.Name: V2 Retail Limited
General.Description: V2 Retail Limited engages in the retail trade of apparels and garments, textiles, and accessories in India. The company sells its products under the One Human, Glamora, Godspeed, Herrlich, ebellia, No War, and Honey Brats brands. The company was incorporated in 2001 and is based in New Delhi, India.

2.Name: Mr. Akash  Agarwal
2.Title: CFO, BR Head & Whole Time Director
